00079 #pragma mark -
00080 #pragma mark Event handling
00081 
00082 - (void)addPost {
00083         if (addBudgetPostViewController == nil) {
00084                 addBudgetPostViewController = [[AddBudgetPostViewController alloc] initWithStyle:UITableViewStylePlain];
00085                 [addBudgetPostViewController setModalTransitionStyle:UIModalTransitionStyleFlipHorizontal];
00086         }
00087         [self.navigationController pushViewController:addBudgetPostViewController animated:YES];
00088 }
00089 
00090 - (void)showSettings {
00091         if (budgetSettingsViewController == nil) {
00092                 budgetSettingsViewController = [[BudgetSettingsViewController alloc] initWithNibName:@"BudgetSettingsViewController" bundle:nil];
00093                 [budgetSettingsViewController setModalTransitionStyle:UIModalTransitionStyleFlipHorizontal];
00094         }
00095         [self.navigationController pushViewController:budgetSettingsViewController animated:YES];
00096 }
